thread.title: US Justice Department Moves To Reinstate Travel Ban
thread.title_full: US Justice Department Moves To Reinstate Travel Ban

title: US Justice Department Moves To Reinstate Travel Ban
text:
1 184 0 1 Facing a slew of legal and political challenges, the legal arm of the US government, the DOJ, has filed a brief in San Francisco defending US President Donald Trump's contested executive order. 
On Monday night, an appeals court decided that it would hear oral arguments on Tuesday to determine whether Trump's restriction on immigration of foreign nationals from seven majority-Muslim nations is constitutional. 
The travel ban is a "lawful exercise" of presidential authority, according to the DOJ. 
MORE DETAILS TO FOLLOW
